description: The nominal AC frequency (or DC), which may be defined or expected

dropdownValues: The port expects or delivers Direct Current
The port defines the frequency as 50Hz.  No connected port may also define the frequency.
The port defines the frequency as 60Hz.  No connected port may also define the frequency.
If 50Hz is present, this will synchronise with it, and if not, it will create 50Hz.
If 60Hz is present, this will synchronise with it, and if not, it will create 60Hz.
If 50Hz or 60Hz is present, this will synchronise with it, but if absent, it will not create it.
The port expects a nominally 50Hz supply.
The port expects a nominally 60Hz supply.
The port expects a supply with a frequency of nominally either 50Hz or 60Hz.
The load will work with either 50Hz AC or DC
The load will work with either 60Hz AC or DC
The load will work with either 50/60Hz AC or DC
